enWisdom: White hair [of old age] is a messenger of death
Grey hair [of old age] is the last of the promises of annihilation

Wisdom: الْعُمُرُ الَّذِي أَعْذَرَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ فِيهِ إِلَى ابْنِ آدَمَ وَأَنْذَرَ السِّتُّونَ
enWisdom: The age up to which Allah, the Glorified, accepts the excuse of human beings and warns them is sixty years
The grey hair of old age is enough of a warner
The grey hair of old age is enough of an announcer [of impending death]

Wisdom: الْعُمُرُ الَّذِي يَبْلُغُ الرَّجُلُ فِيهِ الْأَشُدَّ الْأَرْبَعُونَ
enWisdom: The age in which a person reaches maturity is forty

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخْطَأَهُ [أخطأ] سَهْمُ الْمَنِيَّةِ قَيَّدَهُ الْهَرَمُ
enWisdom: One who is missed by the arrow of death is fettered by old age
